full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNAD DON CHEN SNYING PO DANG BKA' SDOD GTER BSRUNG BCAS KYI MCHOD THABS KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS MDOR BSDUS PA GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS BYED TSUL MDOR BSDUS @004B PA GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GZHAN DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS NYAMS LEN RGYUN KHYER DU BTZUN GZUGS DAM TSIG RDO RJES DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN 'KHRID BDE GNAD TSAD DON 'DUS SU BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
